full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
RCAF DRMIS Aircraft Maintenance Informatics Professional Services

#### Solicitation Number
WS4345162973

#### Amendment Number
7

#### Publication Date
December 12, 2023

#### Closing Date and Time
January 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

#### Amendment Date
January 16, 2024

#### Category and Type
SRV, Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

#### Method of Procurement
Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Notice Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

#### Business Opportunities
None

#### Delivery Locations
British Columbia, Ontario (except National Capital Region), Manitoba, National Capital Region

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information
Kelly, James (SPAC/PSPC) - james.kelly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Description
RCAF DRMIS Aircraft Maintenance Informatics Professional Services. This procurement is subject to a preference for Indigenous businesses. The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. This requirement is for the provision of informatics professional services to RCAF DRMIS Aircraft Maintenance. It is intended to result in the award of up to 1 contract in each of 2 workstreams, with each contract purchasing work from only one workstream. Each contract will be for 3 years plus 2 one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

#### Important Notice
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Trade Agreements
